text:
Gallstone symptoms may be similar to those of other conditions, such as appendicitis, ulcers, pancreatitis, and gastroesophageal refl ux disease.
                
Sometimes, silent gallstones are found when a person does not have any symptoms. For example, a health care provider may notice gallstones when performing ultrasound for a different reason.",NIDDK,Gallstones
What are the treatments for Gallstones ?,"If gallstones are not causing symptoms, treatment is usually not needed. However,
